Class ThirteensBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
      • ThirteensBoard

  • public class ThirteensBoard
extends Board
    The ThirteensBoard class represents the board in a game of Thirteens.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The size (number of cards) on the board.

      The ranks of the cards for this game to be sent to the deck.

      The suits of the cards for this game to be sent to the deck.

      Constant for 13.

    • Method Detail

      • isLegal

        public boolean isLegal(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectedCards)
        Determines if the selected cards form a valid group for removal. In Thirteens, the legal groups are (1) a pair of non-face cards whose values add to 13, and (2) a king.
        Specified by:
        isLegal in class Board
        Parameters:
        selectedCards - the list of the indices of the selected cards.
        Returns:
        true if the selected cards form a valid group for removal; false otherwise.

      • anotherPlayIsPossible

        public boolean anotherPlayIsPossible()
        Determine if there are any legal plays left on the board. In Thirteens, there is a legal play if the board contains (1) a pair of non-face cards whose values add to 13, or (2) a king.
        Specified by:
        anotherPlayIsPossible in class Board
        Returns:
        true if there is a legal play left on the board; false otherwise.

      • containsPairSum13

        private boolean containsPairSum13(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectedCards)
        Check for an 13-pair in the selected cards.
        Parameters:
        selectedCards - selects a subset of this board. It is list of indexes into this board that are searched to find an 13-pair.
        Returns:
        true if the board entries in selectedCards contain an 13-pair; false otherwise.

      • containsKing

        private boolean containsKing(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectedCards)
        Check for a king in the selected cards.
        Parameters:
        selectedCards - selects a subset of this board. It is list of indexes into this board that are searched to find a king.
        Returns:
        true if the board entries in selectedCards include a king; false otherwise.
